title: Does punctuation matter?
description: Why is punctuation important? Neil and Alice discuss rhetoric, commas and full stops.

vocabItems.definition: somebody who insists on a certain way of doing a particular thing
rhetoric the art of persuasive speaking
clause grammatical unit containing a subject and a verb
using words to mean something that is the opposite of its most usual meaning
the usual meaning of a word or phrase
facial expressions made out of keyboard characters
